name: .ARSC
summary: Learn about .ARSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: For the most part, ARSC files are not meant to be opened. However, you can use Android Studio's APK Analyzer to examine an ARSC file's contents. To do so, you must:
Locate the APK file your ARSC file is included in.
Drag the APK file to Android Studio's Editor window.
Double-click your APK file in the default build/​output/​apks directory.
Select Build → Analyze from APK Studio's menu bar and then select your APK file.
